pages.text: $(bred)ConeHead Zombie$() is a Normal Zombie wearing Cone Head.$(br)$(bred)Health$() : $(l)20$()$(br)$(bred)Defence Health$() : $(l)40$()$(br)$(bred)Eat Damage$() : $(l)Low$()$(br)$(bblue)Speed$() : $(l)Normal$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : ConeHead Zombie with $(bgreen)green beard$() has $(l)Normal$() Damage. When it's in water, it will wear a $(byellow)ducky tube$() to speed up.
